text: geudeul-eul indohaneun geos-i geudaeuimuga anigeoneul geugeos-eun hananim-igeubun-ui tteusdaelo indohasinila neo huiga bepun seonhaeng-eun neohoe seuseuloleul wihan geos-imyeo hananim-eul gippeuge ha neun jaseon-ila neohuiga bepun seonhaeng-eun neohuiege chungmanhayeo dol-aonani neohoeneun bulgongpyeonghan daejeob-eul badji anh-eul geos-ila
